subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Inappropriate evp.
author: Pridegrl Neverumind
full_text:

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Mick,
   
  Yes, many pf us have had evps or communications that tell us nasty things... I have a guy named Dave who we at this group refer to as "potty mouth'and  many others have been called bad names too...... Im sure they will tell you in thier own words tho- but this is not uncommon...
  I actually read a study once, where they said on average, 12% of evp communications are mean, or threatening in nature. ( i do not know the validity of this study tho)
  Charm

Mick <micksghosts@...> wrote:
          I was cleaning up some evp's last night that I caught in a local 
cemetery. One of the evp's I swear is calling me a f*****! Is this 
possible? Has anyone encountered language like this with their evp's?

Thanks,

Mick,

--
